title: Drawing, "Study for Players Please, Players Cigarettes", August 27, 1930
medium: Air brush and black, brush and white gouache on cream paper
signed: Signed in black gouache, lower right: E. McK. K.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: This advertisement poster depicts a sailor seen from the back, hauling a line toward the left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Study for Players Please, Players Cigarettes", August 27, 1930.
August 27, 1930. Air brush and black, brush and white gouache on cream paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-865.
